      • injectPlayer

        public static void injectPlayer​(PacketInjector.InjectionService service,
                                @NotNull
                                @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Deprecated.

        Injects code into a players incoming packet stream using ChannelDuplexHandler. It's recommended to run this once inside a PlayerJoinEvent listener.

        Parameters:
        service - Code that should be executed
        player - Bukkit player object

      • removeInjection

        public static void removeInjection​(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Deprecated.

        Remove an active code injector from a players incoming packet stream. If injectPlayer(PacketInjector.InjectionService, Player) was used, it is recommended to call this method where needed, to avoid negative side affects.

        Parameters:
        player - Bukkit player object
